highlight: Dog lover | Passionate about technology, music, and art
intro: My journey into software development began even before university, fueled by curiosity through online courses and the energy of tech communities. Today, I am a Software Engineer with 4 years of experience, specialized in building robust and scalable web applications.
denouement: Throughout my career, I have transformed that initial curiosity into expertise in microservices architectures and real-time systems. I am passionate about solving complex problems, optimizing software performance, and, above all, continuously learning and sharing knowledge with the community.
hobbies: When I'm not coding, you'll find me out for a walk with my dog <anchorEmma>Emma</anchorEmma>, exploring local fairs, or recharging with great music and film.
